description:
Extend the days between summer and Zwift-season. Part of Castelli’s RoS (rain or shine) line, the Spettacolo gloves have been designed to balance warmth and weather protection, without sacrificing breathability. A fleecy lining and efficient synthetic insulation helps you enjoy your cold-season training or even your commute. Dual layer construction means wind and dipping temps won’t faze you. Silicone palms mean your hands stay well-positioned on the bars.

  • Outer layer is windproof and water repellant, protecting you from wind chill and light rain
  • Primaloft® Gold series insulation has an incredible warmth to weight ratio and very breathable
  • Fleece liner adds more cozy warmth
  • Synthetic leather palms add durability
  • YKK® zippered opening keeps the cuffs snug, while still allowing easy on and off
  • Silicone grip pattern on palms and fingers helps you keep your hands on the bars
  • Touchscreen conductive fingertips let you check your phone
  • Castelli recommends these gloves for 3-12°C
name: Castelli Spettacolo Ros Gloves - Men's
